summary: To utilize my customer relations and management background to obtain a position with a company that places importance on efficiency and success. Employ natural leadership and interpersonal skills to build relationships throughout the organization.

experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Responsible for payroll processing, electronic deposits and employee pay adjustments; reconciled bank and credit card accounts; processed journal entries and online transfers; analyzed cost controls and provided timely financial information; assisted CFO with monthly financials and management reports; prepared monthly and annual expense forecasts; managed purchasing and vendor communications; handled A/P with 50+ vendors; resolved collections and billing disputes.

experience.title: Director of Finance & Accounts
experience.description: Daily entry of accounting transactions; cash handling and bank reconciliation; verified purchase orders, managed accounts payable; reconciled bank and credit card accounts; processed payroll for 70+ employees; issued paychecks to contractors; issued W-2s and 1099s; maintained confidential payroll data; produced monthly financial summaries and reports; maintained employee files and training progress.

experience.title: Operations & Training Consultant, Franchisee & General Manager
experience.description: State Training & Operations Consultant role focusing on assisting six-store franchise in training staff, streamlining operations to corporate standards; conducted monthly inspections; partnered with store managers to develop action plans and guide execution.

experience.title: Franchisee
experience.description: Built a performance culture emphasizing teamwork and training; developed advertising and promotional deals; implemented corporate standards; drove revenue and controlled costs; maintained store integrity, including coding, sanitation, equipment; managed labor and food costs; inventory management; training and time-management programs; payroll, inventory and scheduling; managed payables and receivables; prepared reports and documents.

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: Orchestrated and directed a crew up to 20; recruited, trained and promoted staff; improved operational statistics and efficiency; ensured restaurant environment aligned with corporate culture.

experience.title: Patient Service Representative
experience.description: Built positive rapport with patients; registered patients accurately; performed cash management; processed insurance; aided patient account resolution and billing; performed preliminary health assessments; served as liaison between patients and medical providers; mentored new employees; applied HIPAA compliance; prioritized tasks.
